turkish_example_sentence: Biz tatilde olmayacaktık, son anda plan yaptık.
english_example_sentence: We were not going to be on vacation, we made plans at the last minute.
russian_example_sentence: Мы не собирались быть в отпуске, мы составили планы в последнюю минуту.
